Title: OpiConsole (XNA)
Description: OpiConsole provides your XNA projects with a fully working console, allowing you to edit and create functions as well as cvars that will work while you are running your games. It's developed as an XNA DrawableGameComponent and is highly customisable in both functions and style.
HomeWiki:
OpiConsole

Project Description

OpiConsole provides your XNA projects with a fully working console, allowing you to edit and create functions as well as cvars that will work while you are running your games. It's developed as an XNA DrawableGameComponent and is highly customisable in both functions and style.

Screenshots



Getting started

Please read our Getting Started for the quickest way to get going with this console, if you prefer a more in depth tutorial you can visit our Documentation for information about how to use the more advanced features as well as how to build and edit the source code.

Source Code

You are free to download and modify the source code of OpiConsole, however you may want to look at our manual for building the source code to get started.
